programme.title: Wildest India: The Himalayas: Surviving the Summits

programme.desc: Was Donovan Reidy deliberately run down and left to die? In 1995, 23-year-old Donovan Reidy was at a party when he got into a fight. A short while later, his bloodied body was found on the side of a major New Zealand highway.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Sensing Murder Insights - Special
programme.desc: Police detectives from around New Zealand reveal exciting new developments sparked by the Sensing Murder psychics in Series 1.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Anita Cobby Murder
programme.desc: In February 1986, nurse Anita Cobby, a former entrant in the Miss Australia quest, is walking home from Blacktown station in Sydney's outer-western suburbs. A Holden sedan pulls up and Anita is dragged into the vehicle.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Contract to Kill / The Mornington Monster
programme.desc: Crime Investigation Australia has conducted a major investigation which reveals the inside story of the Megan Kalajzich murder and the extraordinary police investigation which will rock the Harbour City's elite to the core.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killing Fields of Truro
programme.desc: For the 2008 launch of Crime Investigation Australia, CI presents the complete and compelling story of "The Killing Fields of Truro", one of the most infamous crimes in Australia and yet another set in Adelaide.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel
programme.desc: We examine two notorious abduction cases. The first case is the Graeme Thorne ransom kidnapping at Bondi in 1960. Thorne, aged eight, was the son of winners of the Sydney Opera House Lottery.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: A Killer Amongst Us: The Norfolk Island Murder
programme.desc: On Easter Sunday 2002, on sleepy Norfolk Island in the south west Pacific, the body of 29-year-old Janelle Patton was found lying in an open field.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Kiss Of Death
programme.desc: Stevie's one night stand with Leo leads to Drovers losing its organic status as he takes revenge by spraying the land with chemicals. Jodi learns Rob's secret - he is on witness protection - bringing them closer together.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Luck By A Lady
programme.desc: Stevie literally gambles everything to save Drovers Run from being possessed by the bank. Hoping to impress Harry and ensure his ownership of Drovers Run, Sandra gazumps Tess's lamb sale.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Real McLeod
programme.desc: When evidence mounts against Stevie, Kate starts to believe that she could be guilty of Harry Ryan’s murder. Riley reacts badly when a local trainer is revealed to be abusing his horses.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Calling
programme.desc: After a series of confusing dreams and visions, Tess learns that Nick is alive. Kate discovers she may have skin cancer - and hides it from her friends. Moira questions her psychic ability, frustrated by its fickleness.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: A STORY: Nick returns, troubled by flashbacks of his mugging in Argentina. B STORY: Kate heads to Adelaide to see the cancer specialist. Jodi follows her, supporting Kate through the terror of discovering she has cancer.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Where the Heart is
programme.desc: A STORY: Nick's unhappiness leads to Tess deciding to return to Argentina with him - after receiving a 'sign' that Drovers Run supports her leaving. B STORY: A brumby stallion lures Phoenix back the wild.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: French Quarter Massacre
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads out to New Orleans, Louisiana to investigate their first case without Grant: The Jimani Lounge Massacre.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Oldest House In Georgia
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS starts out at the Ulster County Jail in Kingston, NY, where inmates and personal have both witnessed activity.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Scream Park
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Sylvan Beach, New York where the new owner of a historic amusement park finds himself in the middle of a mystery.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Prescription For Fear
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Bartonville, Illinois to investigate the Peoria Asylum.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 2
programme.desc: Once in Montrose, Dog discovers that the million dollar fugitive is not the young bondsman's only problem. Dog and Beth make it their mission to both clean up the mess and teach him the fundamentals of bondsmanship.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: Round the Clock
programme.desc: Dog is committed to saving his new friend's bail bonding business, and now must race against time to bring a rogues gallery to justice in the High Sierra mountain town of Montrose, CO.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: And Then There Were None
programme.desc: With four outlaws still on the lam, Dog sets out to bring 'em in. As day turns into night and with the darkness and the danger mounting, an undaunted Dog and team plan late night hits on the riskiest of locations--their targets' homes.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Oh Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: With a long record of violence and abuse and weighing in at over 200lbs, Dog's target for the day does not sound like a gentle giant. When the trail grows cold Dog turns up the heat on the fugitive's brother and sister.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cap and Gown
programme.desc: Friend of the family, Kili, is joining the team to help track down a runner on the Hawaiian island of Maui. This is not the only thing on their schedule, because after the hunt, Kili has to hurry off to his college graduation ceremony!

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Termite Be a Problem
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from - Godwin's House. But while at Godwin's house, Godwin gets a taxidermied gift from a past relative.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: John Luke After Dentist
programme.desc: John Luke and Sadie are getting some dental work done, complete with sedation, and it's up to Willie and Korie to take care of them through the process - including getting them back home safely.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Scoot Along Si
programme.desc: Si shows up to work on a mobility scooter, claiming to have an invisible injury from a fender bender with Willie. After losing her beloved turtle "Mr. T", Ms. Kay enlists Phil on a mission to find a new pet turtle.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jerky Boys
programme.desc: A decision to try and make some duck jerky leads the boys to Godwin's garage and a minibike race. Phil and Kay have made Willie the executor of their will, and Phil wants to show Willie what he and his brothers will inherit when he and Kay pass away.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Going Si-ral
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better. John Luke totals Willie's truck, and Willie realizes he may be raising the two worst drivers in all of Louisiana.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack-O-Lantern
programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander, where they all come together to transform the warehouse into a "scarehouse." Everyone dresses up and Willie desperately tries to be the scariest, but none of the kids are afraid of him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event. However, rehearsals get off to a bumpy start as the guys can't stop sharing their opinions.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: 4 Ton Fireplace In Tow!
programme.desc: Alton and Jessica Puddicombe received a call of a lifetime when his neighbor reached out the day of their wedding and offered them his 1932 farmhouse.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Oversized Garage Coming!
programme.desc: Peter and Sheena Rector have seven children with three kids sharing a bedroom, it’s simply not enough space.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Midnight Mud Race
programme.desc: Ian and Cindy have finally found their dream location but moving their stunning new property proves messier than expected.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Rocky Mountain Trek
programme.desc: Wade and his crew transport a 60-tonne cabin across some of the trickiest terrain yet.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Race Against Time
programme.desc: Wade’s team haul a 70-tonne, 100ft home through crowded suburban streets - but not before they attempt to cut the home down to size. This could be an engineering nightmare!

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Mountain Hell
programme.desc: Wade fears he’s met his match with this next transport – moving a tricky cabin the most treacherous of conditions.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Out of the Ashes
programme.desc: Peter helps restore a Manitoba couple’s love for logs by building a home to replace the one they tragically lost to fire. Meanwhile, the renovation of a neighborhood bar nearly drives Bryan Jr. to drink.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Frying Pan into the Fire
programme.desc: Bryan Jr. whips up an outdoor kitchen before hitting the beach in search of the ultimate driftwood bar.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Going for Gold
programme.desc: Joel takes on the mother of all builds – a 20,000-sq./ft. Pennsylvania mansion complete with walk through tree, hand-carved totem pole and 3-story spiral log staircase.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Johnny on the Spot
programme.desc: Cornisha says Jawaun leaves for weeks at a time and returns broke and jobless. He says Cornisha is too bossy and picks fights causing him to blow up and take days away to cool down. Will they find a cooling point before their relationship melts down?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tardy for the Party
programme.desc: Dashia says William is a cheater and spends most of his money on alcohol instead of paying the bills. William says Dashia is sneaky, belittles him, has trust issues and allows her family to interfere in their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: In and Out
programme.desc: Willard says he’s getting tired of this roller coaster ride of a relationship with Cynthia and he’s had just about as much as he can take with her lies and deception.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Player of the Year
programme.desc: Jordan says that Taurean is the biggest player with the ladies and still decides to lie about it even after she gave him a chance to have an open relationship. He says he talks to other women because Jordan is unaffectionate and verbally abusive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Like a Virgin
programme.desc: Emily is 29 and a virgin. The pressure from her boyfriend Romeo to have sex is overwhelming. Their 20 year age difference may be part of the problem because she chats it up more with strangers than him. Can Judge Toler help them find common ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Brexit
programme.desc: Over 17 years of marriage Leon has had countless affairs with other women and Siobhan has had it. She claims all he wants is for her to keep his house clean and pick up after him. Leon argues that the problems stem from Siobhan’s bad drinking habits.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Secret Lies
programme.desc: Billy wants Marylu to quit pole dancing and stripping, while she wants Billy to confess if he’s straight or not. Billy has a fetish for wearing women’s underwear and he needs to fess up if he likes women, men or both.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Can't Buy Love
programme.desc: Chimira gets lavish vacations, gifts and a designer wardrobe from Bennie, but suspects he is cheating on her. Bennie says she should be grateful for her good life. Can Bennie learn to give his time and support instead of luxuries and an empty home?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Not Man Enough
programme.desc: No matter how hard Demont tries, he's always looking up at the bar Reasha keeps raising. Demont got a promotion and relocated for work, which raised her suspicions of him cheating. Can this couple ignite the spark or is this relationship totaled?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Nana Bread
programme.desc: Markia says Herb's overactive sex drive is ruining their relationship because he wants it daily. When Herb doesn't get his way, he throws major tantrums. Can Herb learn to take breathers or has this 11 year relationship taking its toll?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Dead Weight
programme.desc: They say opposites attract, but Betty is starting to feel weighed down by David. David is lazy and disrespectful for how broke he is all the time. Betty no longer wants to be tied down by being with someone who is always unemployed and lies about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Out for Delivery
programme.desc: Jeanine says Marvin is cheating with co-workers and often meets up with his exes when they visit family in their hometown. He asserts she’s the one who cheated, not him, and she is so insecure she won’t stop bugging him about it.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Searchers
programme.desc: Dog is still on the search for the elusive fugitive, Marco. Dog has been tracking him across Colorado, from Grand Junction to Denver, and now a hot tip that a long time associate of his is hiding in Pueblo sends the team racing south.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Buddha's Delight
programme.desc: Dog and the posse travel to the Big Island to help Leland track down a small-time Bonnie and Clyde couple. Their crime: theft, including allegedly stealing a pair of Buddha statues for resale.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Three's Company
programme.desc: This fugitive is hard to pin down in Honolulu's downtown district, moving from hostel to hotel to apartment high-rise. But as the hunt evolves, Dog discovers that this alleged burglar isn't the only family member wanted by the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Strip Search
programme.desc: When a stripper goes on the lam, Dog has to bring her in. It's a tough job but somebody has to do it. Thankfully for the team, Lady Luck is presiding over the posse tonight.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secret Places
programme.desc: When Leland learns that one of his clients with a reputation for stealing has lost her co-signer and could be ready to run, Dog and the crew hop a plane to the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Wrong Turn
programme.desc: Dog's target today seems to have a taste for drugs and a record of reckless driving. The hunt has deep emotional resonance for the team because today is the anniversary of the fatal car accident of Dog's daughter Barbara Katie.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Easy Rider
programme.desc: What looks like a routine pick-up turns into a complicated case of betrayal, deceit, as well as quality nail care as Dog and company track down a fugitive alleged to be an abusive boyfriend with one too many friends in his close knit community.

programme.title: Run's House: Rev's Fix It List
programme.desc: Some of Rev's husbandly habits are wearing thin on Justine and leaving her feeling disrespected. Rev is shocked to hear that there are a "few" things to improve and challenges Justine to make a list.

programme.title: Run's House: Rev Mom
programme.desc: Rev and Justine discover that Justine is pregnant. As the family deals with the news Justine realizes that she has plenty she wants to accomplish before she feels immobilized by her pregnancy.

programme.title: Run's House: Downward Facing Dawg
programme.desc: Seeking relief from the stress of his life, Run seeks the advice of his brother, Russell. Run decides to shadow his brother and give yoga a try in hopes that peace will find him.

programme.title: Run's House: Anger Management
programme.desc: Mom and Dad express concern over Russy's temper and decide to get professional help.

programme.title: Run's House: Baby Booming
programme.desc: When Angela decides that she needs a new dog as a fashion accessory Rev puts his foot down.

programme.title: Run's House: Victoria Anne Simmons
programme.desc: Season three picks up with a very pregnant Justine and an anxious family awaiting the birth of their new child and sibling.

programme.title: Run's House: Hangin' with Run
programme.desc: Rev Run notices that Jojo isn't spending much time at home, instead, opting to hang out with his friends away from home.

programme.title: Run's House: Weight a Minute
programme.desc: Angela feels fat and actually thinks she needs to lose fifteen to twenty pounds. Vanessa thinks she's nuts for thinking she needs to lose that much weight and tells Mom and Dad.

programme.title: Run's House: Sneaker Pimps & Mini Moguls
programme.desc: Russy tells Run he wants to make more money by selling the toys he no longer uses.

programme.title: Run's House: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: Vanessa and Angela are in desperate need of money to decorate their apartment.

programme.title: Run's House: Home Alone
programme.desc: With the release of Justine's children's book fast approaching, Run suggests a quiet, peaceful weekend away, to help her prepare for an upcoming book reading.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Death Room
programme.desc: PRS arrives in Ryan's hometown to help the new owner of an old southern plantation unearth its dark history.?A painful family secret reveals a tale of greed and neglect, and the team must help free its unwilling victim from her spiritual prison.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: Ryan leads his team to one of the most haunted places in the US to confront their fears and solve a paranormal mystery. Aside from the alleged spirits of dead prisoners, something even darker may be lurking inside West Virginia State Penitentiary.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Permission To Do Harm
programme.desc: When a mirror levitates and shatters on its own, P.R.S. heeds the call to investigate a spirit that has been unleashed on an unsuspecting family. Ryan must track down the spirit and contain it before it does irreparable damage.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Paranormal Intervention
programme.desc: Carol Ann stays awake every night taping the voices of the dead. PRS cuts their winter break short to help her curtail her obsession and close this doorway to the dead--for good.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Return of the Dead: Glove II
programme.desc: PRS returns to the site of one of their most famous cases, Daisytown, PA, where they had discovered a glove print of an old miner that they determined was the spirit of a Great-Grandfather.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vegas
programme.desc: The PRS travels to Sin City to investigate a 14-year old medium who claims to speak to a dead girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: I Am Six
programme.desc: Laura has felt oppressed by a violent spirit ever since she heard a chilling EVP in the fall of 2007. The 26-year-old claims she's been beaten, choked, even forcibly submerged.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Village Church Farm
programme.desc: A museum like no other, this small collection of antiquated buildings is said to be the home of several spirits. The team get more than they bargained for as objects move; strange noises are caught on camera and the best EVP response to date.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Old Nick Theatre
programme.desc: Once a prison and a police station and now a theatre the Old Nick is famous for its unexplained occurrences. Fred decides to summon up some extra help while objects move and something wants to make itself known.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Black Country Living Museum
programme.desc: The team have a whole village to investigate with results that amazed the all. With a playful spirit communicating through the Ouija board and the EVP machine at the same time the team seem to have their first two-way conversation with the dead.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Lyceum Theatre
programme.desc: The Lyceum Theatre in Crewe is known for its paranormal activity and in this episode the team take the fight right to phantoms that lurk in its darkness with some frightening consequences.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Whittingdon Castle
programme.desc: The ghost of a drowned soldier awaits Yvette and her team of paranormal experts as they tackle the hauntings that plague this once magnificent castle.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Halsham House
programme.desc: Nestled into the British countryside is Halsham house where a poltergeist hides in wait for the team with frightening effect. With bones found in the attic have the team pushed it too far.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Love and Marriage - Part 1
programme.desc: Bickering couples go on a trip to learn what it was that brought them together.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Love and Marriage - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark work to keep the three couples together.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Code Name: FREAK
programme.desc: A 12-year-old genius at college is treated like a social outcast by his less intelligent but more socially adept schoolmates.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Man to Man
programme.desc: A wealthy businessman would like to bridge the gap between himself and his son.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Jonathan Smith Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Jonathan tries to convince a powerful senator to restore severe budget cuts dealing with health-care. However, the assignment seems doomed when the senator suffers a fatal heart attack.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: Danny and Evan's life on the run doesn't start well when Danny falls asleep at the wheel and drives into a ditch. They have to enlist a local farmer, Johann, to winch them out.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: Danny is asked by the State Vet to help control an outbreak of rabies in the National Park. When Vanessa is concerned for the animals at Mara, Danny assures her it's a long way away and advises her to continue with business as usual.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: It's the day before Rosie's wedding. Danny is proud of his daughter and determined to feed her up now that she's eating for two. All the family are excited about the imminent return of Caroline, especially Du Plessis who can't wait to see his fiancé.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5
programme.desc: Alice and Danny are called out by a farmer who's trapped an African Wild Dog. As they're even more endangered than cheetahs and much more vicious, Danny and Alice are amazed to see one up close.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: When Du Plessis instructs the family to be around for dinner, they are intrigued to hear he's planning a big announcement. However, he won't be drawn on details and tells them to be patient.

programme.title: Just Kidding: Keep an Eye on Dollie
programme.desc: Romantic supper on rails, Slime shooting snail and many more pranks.

programme.title: Just for Laughs Gags: Ghost Pottery

programme.title: Moesha: Family Affair

programme.title: Moesha: Something About Moesha
programme.desc: Having been neighbors and friends nearly all their lives, Moesha and Hakeem wonder if there is more to their relationship.

programme.title: Moesha: The Robbing Hood

programme.title: Moesha: Arriving Right On Q

programme.title: Dynasty: Circumstantial Evidence

programme.title: Dynasty: The Collapse

programme.title: Dynasty: Life and Death

programme.title: Dynasty: Parental Consent

programme.title: Dynasty: Photo Finish

programme.title: World's Greatest: Treks
programme.desc: Every journey made by foot promises a grand adventure. From the highest mountains to the wildest jungle realms, treks venture down the road less travelled, allowing us to connect to nature, history, and culture, one step at a time.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Cruises
programme.desc: There is something seductive about setting sail. Cruises offer us a chance to dip our toes into the 70% of our planet awash with oceans, rivers, and lakes, exploring places that can only be reached by daring to leave the shore.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Flights
programme.desc: Our experience of the world’s greatest marvels is literally and figuratively elevated when we explore them from the air. Whether you travel by air balloon, helicopter, light aircraft, a grand perspective is always guaranteed.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Forest Animals
programme.desc: Forest Animals gets up close with bears, koalas, moose, wolves, weaver ants, and Tasmanian Devils. This episode roves dark forests floors and soars above vast canopies of green in America, China, Laos, and Australia.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Grassland Animals
programme.desc: Grasslands are the great stages of the natural world where large animals play out spectacular lives in clear view of people, including lions, leopards, elephants, rhinoceros, cheetahs, impalas, kangaroos, wallaby, potoroo, bison, and wolves.

programme.title: Arthur: Night of the Tibble/Read and Flumberghast
programme.desc: The Tibble Twins are having their first sleepover! Will the Tibbles lock James in the dark basement? Then, a cupcake's been stolen! The primary suspect: Tommy Tibble. D.W. gathers a jury and demands that justice be served.

programme.title: Arthur: Water and The Brain/Arthur The Unfunny
programme.desc: Is The Brain a snob? That seems to be the explanation for why he won't go to Waterworld with his friends. And, Arthur's a notorious joke-killer. But when he's scheduled to perform as a carnival clown, he learns how to make people laugh!

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Underwear/Francine Frensky, Olympic Rider
programme.desc: Arthur thinks it's hilarious when Binky Barnes' pants split during class--until he starts having nightmares about it happening to him. Then, Francine secretly dreams of being an Olympic equestrienne, but first she has to learn to ride.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Tooth/D.W. Gets Lost
programme.desc: It's bad enough to wear glasses all the time. But does Arthur have to be the last person in his class to lose his baby teeth? Then, if you think being lost in a humongous department store would scare a four-year-old, think again.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. Thinks Big/Arthur Cleans Up
programme.desc: Once again, Arthur gets to do everything. Mostly he gets to carry the ring in Aunt Lucy's wedding. Elwood City's park is in sad shape, and after grumbling about it, the kids find themselves volunteered to clean it up.

programme.title: Arthur: I Wanna Hold Your Hand/Whistling in the Wind
programme.desc: During a shopping trip to the mall, Binky gets caught doing the uncoolest of all the uncool things in the world--holding his mom's hand! If the Tibbles are supposed to be exactly the same, why can Tommy whistle while Timmy can't?

programme.title: Arthur: Portrait of the Artist as a Young Tibble/The Secret Guardians
programme.desc: The Tibble Twins start a new business to earn enough money to buy the coveted Krummy Kreepy Kastle. When and friends stumble upon a beautiful woodland oasis right by their homes, they vow to tell no one and keep it as their secret spot.

programme.title: Arthur: Based on a True Story (Part 1 & 2)
programme.desc: There's a new kid in town: Ladonna Compson, the Louisiana native with the gift of gab. Ladonna charms Arthur and friends with her amazing "true" stories. But are her stories really fact…or fiction?

programme.title: Arthur: The Last of Mary Moo Cow/Bitzi's Beau
programme.desc: When Mary Moo Cow is cancelled, D.W. is devastated. How can television--or life as she knows it--ever be the same? Buster hasn't yet met Bitzi's new boyfriend, but he fears the worst. What if he is a Mom-stealer?

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Battle of Midway (June 2, 1942)
programme.desc: Only one isolated atoll prevents an enemy invasion of Hawaii. Midway Island is where the Japanese fleet converges on a tiny American base with a massive strafing and bombing attack.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Solomon Islands (July 1942)
programme.desc: For the first time since Americans entered the war, Marines face Japanese infantrymen at Guadal Canal. In the jungles, two powerful armies clash in a six month battle that claims nearly 30,000 lives.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Dieppe
programme.desc: The Allies launch an ill-fated attack on the German-occupied port of Dieppe, France.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Stalingrad
programme.desc: German forces encounter Russian resistance.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: El Alamein
programme.desc: Erwin Rommel battles Allied forces in North Africa in 1942.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: North Africa (November 1942)
programme.desc: In the North African desert in 1942, American fighting forces encounter the dreaded Rommel for the first time to stop the German war machine.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Burma: The Forgotten Front (Spring 1943)
programme.desc: The Japanese meet resistance from British forces as they advance through Burma to take India in 1944.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Sicily
programme.desc: Fresh from victory in North Africa, the Allies successfully invade the island of Sicily, staging an eventual Italian withdrawal from the war.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Bombing of Ploesti
programme.desc: American bombers target a Romanian oil refinery in a daring 1943 mission.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Monte Cassino (September 3, 1943)
programme.desc: As the allies make their way into Italy, they encounter tremendous resistance at German defensive positions along the Gustav line. One of these locations is an ancient monastery called Monte Cassino.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Steven & Samm
programme.desc: Steven is due to graduate high school, instead of planning for college he wants to move to California for his online love, Samm. Steven's mum is sceptical of Samm's identity. (S4, ep10)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Sunny & Jamison
programme.desc: Sunny is in love with the man of her dreams. Jamison is a model, a TV writer, and also studying to be an anaesthesiologist. However, the pair have never met. Is Jamison too good to be true?

programme.title: Catfish UK: Tasheeka & Aaron
programme.desc: After avoiding video calls for 2 years, Tasheeka is desperate to find out if Aaron is her Prince Charming. It's up to Julie and Oobah to see if this online romance has a fairy tale ending. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Taylor & Brad
programme.desc: Taylor is falling in love with Brad despite never having seen his face. Can Oobah and Nella find the man of her dreams, and will Taylor get her happy ever after? (S2, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Thad & Sara
programme.desc: Thaddius sought refuge from his struggling marriage through an online relationship with Sara. When she starts telling tales of seizures and kidnappings, he starts to question her identity. (S4, ep14)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tiana & James
programme.desc: After a three-year online relationship, Tiana moved across the country to be with love-of-her-life James, and reveal her secret. Now in the same state, James seems more elusive than ever. (S4, ep11)

programme.title: The Hills: Enough Is Enough / New Year, New Friends
programme.desc: Spencer asks Heidi to move in with him but Heidi doesn't know what to do or how to tell her roommate, Lauren. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: The Hills: Apology Not Accepted / Everyone Falls
programme.desc: Lauren's turning 21 and Heidi has big plans for the birthday bash. But, before the party, Heidi decides it's time to tell Lauren about Spencer's big idea to move in together. (S2, ep10)

programme.title: The City: If You Want Something Done Right...
programme.desc: Whitney lets Roxy work on a big project, even though Kelly thinks Roxy can't be trusted. When Olivia comes up short for a new assignment, she and Erin have a huge fight. (s1, ep22)

programme.title: The City: Everything on The Line
programme.desc: A sales presentation with Bergdorf Goodman doesn't go as Whitney hoped, but it leads to an even bigger opportunity. Erin &amp; Olivia work together to put Joe Zee on the Today Show. (S1, ep23)

programme.title: The City: Show 'Em What You Got
programme.desc: Whitney shows her line at NY Fashion Week when one of Kelly's designers drops out. Joe Zee solves the issues between Erin &amp; Olivia by promoting Olivia to an on-camera interviewer. (S2, ep1)

programme.title: The City: Friends In High Places
programme.desc: Kelly pushes Whitney to market her line after her first fashion show. Olivia refuses to support Whitney's line at ELLE Magazine, but Erin goes over her head to Joe Zee. (S2, ep2)

programme.title: The City: Professionally Dangerous
programme.desc: Whitney and Olivia go head-to-head after Olivia decides to interview her friend for ELLE, instead of covering Whitney's line. Roxy goes out with Zach. (S2, ep3)

programme.title: The City: Queen Of Diamonds
programme.desc: Olivia &amp; Erin have different ideas of how to dress Fergie for an ELLE cover shoot, leaving Joe Zee in the middle. A French photographer is interested in Whitney, but she's unsure. (S2, ep4)

programme.title: The City: The Belle of Elle
programme.desc: Whitney brings Roxy to a Glamour magazine shoot, despite Kelly's advice, and it almost ends in disaster. Erin &amp; Olivia compete to be featured in New York's biggest gossip column. (S2, ep5)

programme.title: The Hills: Goodbye for Now / You Know What You Did
programme.desc: In this season finale, Heidi makes her final decision about moving in with Spencer. Lauren looks to Audrina to fill the void left by her best friend, and Whitney flies to New York. (S2, ep12)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Terror at the Morgue
programme.desc: Dr. O.C. Smith, a medical examiner, was apparently attacked on June 1, 2002, as he was leaving work. He was found wrapped in barbed wire with a bomb strapped to his neck. Dr. Smith survived but expressed concern that his assailant might attack again

programme.title: 48 Hours: SolveThis Case: Who Killed Kay Wenal
programme.desc: Investigators ask for the public's help to solve the 2008 murder of Kay Wenal, a former model found dead in her home in Georgia.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Spies, Lies and Secrets
programme.desc: A report about the death of Shane Todd, a brilliant, high-tech engineer at a Singapore company who, according to his parents, was murdered because he was unwilling to share secrets that could harm the United States.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Prime Suspect
programme.desc: Billy Fox, 33, is a devoted father of two and a soccer coach. He appears to be an all-around regular guy. But he’s booked for the death of a baby. It's a charge that could put him in prison for the rest of his life.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Driven to Extremes
programme.desc: Mary Hill was driving three teens, when her BMW crashed and killed two of them. Hill claims she lost control as the car sped up on its own, but investigators say she was driving recklessly. Hill was charged with vehicular homicide and manslaughter.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Power and Passion
programme.desc: 48 Hours probes case of Alabama politician Stephen Nodine -- accused in the 2010 shooting death of his mistress, Angel Downs.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Fountain
programme.desc: George Maharis guest stars as John Bachman, an underworld figure with access to the syndicate's top secret computerized records who is convinced by the IMF that he has found the fountain of youth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Fighter
programme.desc: William Windom guest stars as Paul Mitchell, a boxing promoter tied to a crime syndicate who becomes a target of the IMF when one of his fighters is killed before he can talk to the police.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Speed
programme.desc: A breathtaking motorcycle chase over the hills of San Francisco figures prominently in the IMF's plan to recover three tons of the drug commonly known as speed from Sam Hibbing's illegal drug operation.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Pendulum
programme.desc: Dean Stockwell guest stars as Gunnar Malstrom, one of the leaders of Pendulum -- a secret terrorist organization -- who has a plan involving a major attack on the government that the Impossible Missions Force is assigned to uncover.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Western
programme.desc: Ed Nelson guest stars as Van Cleve, a brilliant thief who is convinced by the IMF that he has the power of precognition as part of its plan to recover the more than five million dollars worth of art treasures that he has stolen.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: It's A Happy Day!
programme.desc: Beth has invented a brand-new holiday called "Happy Day," in which everyone gets to make a wish for something which will make them happy—and everyone else tries to make that wish come true! Barney and the kids discuss feelings and facial expressions.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Moving Along
programme.desc: Barney plays a fun game of "Simon Says" with Baby Bop and BJ in the park. They demonstrate how to move their bodies through dancing and playing games.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: This Way In, This Way Out!
programme.desc: Angela is in the park to release her turtle after observing him with her classmates in school. Barney and the children discuss the meaning of in and out after observing the turtle going in and out of his shell.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Play Piano With Me!
programme.desc: The children learn all about the piano when they play games, listen to real pianos and even play a little themselves.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A World of Friends
programme.desc: The children learn about many different countries while experiencing an "International Fair" on the playground.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Easy as ABC
programme.desc: When Baby Bop uses the caboose mailbox to deliver a special invitation to her tea party, she discovers that no one can read her handwriting. Barney and his friends find creative ways to help her learn her ABCs!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Tea-riffic Manners
programme.desc: A tea party planned by the children turns into a fun opportunity to reinforce lessons about good manners! Throughout the day, Baby Bop is given helpful advice.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Grace’s food drive isn’t going very well until Melanie offers to help. Melanie comes up with the perfect idea to get people to donate – put on a movie premiere in the caboose!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Risk & Reward
programme.desc: Ton & Allen arrive late to an auction. They uncover vintage bear traps and a bounty of street art. If the pieces belong to the artist, RISK, it could be their biggest score ever. If not, they'll be stuck with forged knockoffs.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Brew-Phoria
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go all in for an electric car, but with the batteries missing, a pricey refurb is their only shot at a profit. Will a home brewing system and high-end air rifles help soften the blow, or will they take a big loss?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Diesel Digs
programme.desc: The guys head to the industrial hub of LA to score some heavy machinery and unearth a 1981 Bobcat 743 Frontloader, one of the first powered by a diesel engine and a trench-defending WWI German Sturmtrupp helmet bashing mace.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sidecar Surprise
programme.desc: An unassuming mom in an oversized sweater tries to pull the wool over Ton & Allen's eyes at a storage auction in Arlington, VA. The guys uncover a black powder cannon designed in the 15th century & a Russian military motorcycle!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chi-Town Showdown
programme.desc: Metal Victorian-era burial casket; 1870s glass fire extinguisher grenades; a mechanical 1896 handcrafted Chicago fire station alarm box.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Pucks for Bucks
programme.desc: The guys get stuck with a unit they didn't want and have to sort through trash to make their bottom line. They uncover glass blowing tools, autographed baseballs and a hockey puck launcher, which puts Ton in the line of fire.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Trading Places
programme.desc: When an injury sidelines Allen, he stays at the shop while Ton takes Big Sis to the auction and goes rogue, ignoring Allen's advice and making risky purchases that could lose the partners a boatload of cash.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Wild West
programme.desc: Allen and Ton explain their strategies at a storage auction in San Bernardino, win two units, then have a Pepperbox gun and vintage Lionel train set appraised by experts.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Blazing Saddles
programme.desc: Ton and Allen head to a Hollywood auction and face a new competitor with a seemingly endless cash flow. After they uncover a triple barrel shotgun and an antique camel saddle, Allen confronts an old childhood fear.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Wreck-Shaw
programme.desc: Allen drags a starving Ton to a weekend auction and some newbie buyers try to eat up all the profit. Will a rickshaw, a wrecking ball, and blast detonators be enough to satisfy Ton's appetite, or will the guys go home hungry?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Party Gras
programme.desc: On a trip to New Orleans, Ton and Allen look to mix business with pleasure. They wage war with some locals at a tough auction, win a Mardi Gras unit that contains a confetti blaster and a modern calliope, then hit the town.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Family Bonds
programme.desc: Farrah contacts Sophia's dad's family in an attempt to get social security benefits. Maci tells Ryan she's moving to Nashville, and Catelynn and Tyler learn Butch is back in jail.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Lashing Out
programme.desc: Catelynn and Tyler learn they will not graduate on time. Farrah has an emotional reunion with Sophia's dad's sister for the first time since he died, and Amber lashes out at Gary.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Too Much Too Soon
programme.desc: Maci confronts Kyle when she sees her new life in Nashville isn't what she expected. Amber breaks up with Gary and starts dating. Farrah gets the results of Sophia's DNA test.

programme.title: Teen Mom: See You Later
programme.desc: Catelynn and Tyler have an emotional reunion with their daughter. Amber and Gary try to work out custody of Leah now that they are broken up, and Farrah's mum sets her up on a date.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Catch Up Special
programme.desc: Special episode in front of a studio audience. Maci, Farrah, Amber and Catelynn discuss their ups and downs, achievements and regrets. Last in the series.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Bodies discovered relate to a psychopath re-enacting the game of Clue in real life.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The owner of a popular bar is killed and robbed.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Two people are killed with a gun printed from a computer.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team use the art of interrogation when a beloved off-duty NYPD officer dies.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team investigates when a masked man is found at the bottom of a skyscraper.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team investigate what appears to be a fatal car-jacking.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team are called to a fashion boutique when a young girl is killed in an explosion.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A baby is snatched from her mother's arms by a professional kidnapper.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a shooter targets where Delko is staying, Horatio has to look into Delko's past.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate the murder of a wealthy racehorse owner.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: As the team tackles a case involving a dead doctor, Calleigh falls into a coma.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: New evidence appears that may prove a convicted murderer's innocence.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Metal on Metal
programme.desc: A athlete is gunned down just weeks before starting college, leaving family heartbroken and detectives stumped. The man seems an unlikely target, until Lt. Joe Kenda pries into his personal life.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Tighten the Screws
programme.desc: When young Iraq War veteran Curtis Ashley ends up dead, Lt. Joe Kenda has to solve the slaying of a seemingly innocent victim using his keen awareness of the criminal mind.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Bring My Baby Home
programme.desc: A four-week-old girl is kidnapped, leaving her mother in anguish and police scrambling to find her. Joe Kenda and Robert Sapp fear she’s been sold on the black market… or worse.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Shallow Grave
programme.desc: Lt. Joe Kenda and his team investigate the scene of an apparent suicide, only to be forced to flee when they discover the house is booby-trapped.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Murder Bites
programme.desc: A young woman is found naked and strangled in a park not 200 yards from her home. It isn’t until Lt. Joe Kenda rethinks the entire case that he realizes someone has been lying.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: John 3:16

programme.title: Wardens: Operation Elk Dummy
programme.desc: Montana game wardens deploy elk decoys across the state in hopes of catching would-be poachers.

programme.title: Wardens: Operation Wolf Creek
programme.desc: Wardens patrol the Wolf Creek area of Montana for illegal hunting activity. Elsewhere, Wardens conduct a mule deer decoy operation.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Butterflies
programme.desc: Andy's world explodes when a fresh-faced university student is killed in a random shooting, and a bullet hits Andy, lodging in her vest.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Might Have Been
programme.desc: Everyone's living their “might-have-beens.” Andy and Gail go undercover as cocktail waitresses to clean up a drug-infested club, but get more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Bad Moon
programme.desc: As a full moon hangs over the city, the rookies are unnerved by a series of strange occurrences. While investigating the theft of three severed heads, Andy and Swarek pick up the trail of a mentally unstable man who has stopped taking his medication

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Heart & Sparks
programme.desc: As 15 Division recovers from the shooting of Det. Luke Callaghan, a series of arsons culminates in the torching of a laundromat – and the rookies are forced to confront their own burning issues.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Stung
programme.desc: Using a local car dealership, 15 Division runs a sting operation to crack down on suspects with outstanding warrants. One of the criminals they capture tries to bargain for a lighter sentence

programme.title: Rookie Blue: In Plain View
programme.desc: When a police informant is found murdered, 15 Division sets its sights on finding a weak link in the notoriously brutal East Jameson gang. Andy has to work closely with Detective Jo Rosati, a woman who seems far too interested in Andy’s fiancé, Luke.

programme.title: Survivor
programme.desc: Framed for a terrorist bombing, a foreign service officer (Milla Jovovich) must dodge a top assassin (Pierce Brosnan), while racing against time to thwart a deadly plot.

programme.title: The Interrogation of Michael Crowe
programme.desc: A woman (Ally Sheedy) tries to help her 14-year-old son after police coerce him into confessing to murdering his sister.

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: A former thief (Nicolas Cage) has just 12 hours to come up with $10 million after his former partner (Josh Lucas) kidnaps his daughter and locks her in a cab.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Devil Doll
programme.desc: A guide leads Sydney and Nigel to an unusual, underground Aztec burial chamber. Instead of a body, they find a relic.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Incognito

programme.title: Relic Hunter: All Choked Up
programme.desc: Carson Inez, a collector, uses an ancient necklace to get Sydney to help her in raising Athena who will then help her conquer the world.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Warlock of Nu Theta Phi
programme.desc: When Sydney's student Meg's roommate finds a witch's amulet, it hospitalizes Meg. Meg's boyfriend's fraternity brother races to get the amulet. What is he up to?

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Fire in the Sky
programme.desc: While Sydney is lecturing about the Native Americans who faced a mysterious cataclysm 600 years earlier, a native brings her a relic from that era. What is its secret?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens : Origin Of Humanity
programme.desc: Increasing evidence and sightings of UFOs suggest contact with extraterrestrial beings who may have influenced the origins of human life.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Keys to the Kingdom
programme.desc: The relic left by Ma'el is stolen from the mother ship. Zo'or threatens to destroy a major city if it isn't returned. Liam believes the final chapters contain information on synthesizing core energy.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Street Chase
programme.desc: Sandoval is watching via nanobots inside Street as she tries to decipher Ma'el's riddle. She tries to figure out how to escape from Sandoval and the Taelons forcing her to solve the riddle. She flashes back to childhood fears.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Trapped by Time
programme.desc: Liam and Renee learn of a facility where time travelers from the future are being held. They try to learn from them what happens to the Taelons. Sandoval's wife is used as a pawn to gain important information from him.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Atonement
programme.desc: Sandoval goes to Renee to request a trial to testify to atrocities against humanity committed by the Taelons. A manhunt for Sandoval begins when he quits and leaves the mother ship. Liam has to protect him on his way to the grand jury.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Blood Ties
programme.desc: Strange assaults and several deaths may be related to a Doors/Taelon joint venture where Taelon core energy was used to heal people. It appears that the energy is being sucked back out of the patients.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Hearts and Minds
programme.desc: When Renee's boyfriend appears to her while he is imprisoned on the mother ship, Liam theorizes a special energy bond between the pair. Zo'or is upset by the human's betrayal and bans all humans from the mother ship.

programme.title: The Lost World: More Than Human
programme.desc: The adventurers are captured by a reptilian race in a land where humans are at the bottom of the hierarchy. They come across other enslaved humans and rally them to help fight back.

programme.title: The Lost World: Nectar
programme.desc: To retrieve an antidote that will save professor Summerlee from deadly venom, the explorers must venture into a bee hive that no human has ever made it out of alive.

programme.title: The Lost World: Cave of Fear
programme.desc: Professor Challenger is taken hostage. To save him, the group, goes into the cave of fear to retrieve bones for a ritual offering. In the process, they revisit the dark corners of their past.

programme.title: The Lost World: Salvation
programme.desc: Summerlee saves an unconscious child from a river with CPR, which convinces the village leader they are witches. They will be burned on the stake unless they can influence the council otherwise.

programme.title: The Lost World: Blood Lust
programme.desc: Marguerite and Professor Challenger must save Roxton when he gets bit by a diseased man and transforms into a Vampire. Meanwhile, Veronica proves to two men that she doesn't belong to either of them.

programme.title: The Lost World: Out of Time
programme.desc: Marguerite, the reincarnation of the Druid's priestess, must fulfill her destiny by retrieving emeralds that will save them. Veronica has difficulty giving up a baby she has grown attached to.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Tim Brooke-Taylor and Graeme Garden get back into character as they join Will Axon and Philip Serrell and take to the road in Devon. Along the way, these off-the-wall comedians enter the equally surreal world of two eccentric inventors.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Hermione Norris and John Thomson join up with Mark Stacey and Catherine Southon on a classic car trip through Cornwall, aiming to buy antiques for auction in London. On the way, John learns nautical history and Hermione takes off.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Lucy Alexander and Martin Roberts trade homes for antiques! Paired up with experts James Braxton and James Lewis, they scour Hampshire in search of bargains to sell at auction for profit--to benefit Children in Need.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Frances Barber and Phil Davis join Catherine Southon and Thomas Plant on a buying spree around East Sussex. Armed with £400 and a classic car, they hear a gripping tale of eccentricity and attempted murder on the way to auction in London.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harry
programme.desc: After six months, single mum Emma and online love Harry have already set a wedding date. But the problem is, they've never met. So it's up to the Catfish UK team to track him down. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Leanne & Jamie
programme.desc: Leanne is desperate to find out if online love Jamie is her Mr Right. After cancelling on her numerous times, Leanne wants Oobah and Nella to investigate and finally bring them face to face. (S2, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Neil & Jasmin
programme.desc: Neil has been chatting to Jasmin for 3 years and she's stood him up 13 times. So it's up to Julie and Oobah to find out if the person Neil has fallen for...is real? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Rob & Sarah
programme.desc: Oobah is joined by Nathan Henry to help Rob track down his soulmate, Sarah. After two and a half years, Sarah has suddenly gone quiet and it's up to Oobah and Nathan to investigate. (S2, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Esther & Theo
programme.desc: Esther's finally found her match in Theo. But he always refuses to video call. So it's up to Julia and Oobah to find out if Theo is who he says he is. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alex & Matt
programme.desc: Alex has been chatting to Matt for a year and thinks he could be the one. But after several failed attempts to meet, Alex wants Julie and Oobah to track him down. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: Monster Squad: Queen Bee
programme.desc: Dracula infiltrates the Queen Bee's hive in an effort to thwart a worldwide bee invasion.

programme.title: Monster Squad: Mr. Mephisto
programme.desc: Confusion abounds when Mr. Mephisto replaces Mayor Goldwyn with a lookalike doll who spouts off radical opinions.

programme.title: Monster Squad: The Tickler
programme.desc: The Tickler passes off counterfeit bills in an attempt to lure the Monster Squad into a trap.

programme.title: Monster Squad: The Ringmaster
programme.desc: The Ringmaster holds children hostage as part of a larger scheme to buy out and close down all of the toy stores in America.

programme.title: Monster Squad
programme.desc: Frank and Dracula sign up for music lessons in an attempt to foil the mad musicians who robbed a telethon.

programme.title: Monster Squad: No Face
programme.desc: Mayor Goldwyn gives the deed to the city to Chief Running Nose, and then he declares all crime legal. Before long, the Monster Squad discovers No Face has been masquerading as both of them.

programme.title: Monster Squad: The Astrologer
programme.desc: During a newscast, The Astrologer announces that an earthquake is about to devastate the land, and to ensure his prediction comes true, he makes plans to detonate an atomic bomb.

programme.title: Monster Squad: Ultra Witch
programme.desc: Ultra Witch dries up the world's milk supply, but she exposes herself by sending a henchman out for cookies.

programme.title: Monster Squad: The Wizard
programme.desc: The Wizard devises a scheme to steal all of the national monuments for his own personal exhibit. Meanwhile, Walter concocts an antidote that works on every poison known to man.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E1 - Mind The Baby
programme.desc: Crichton, Aeryn and D'argo are stranded in an asteroid field while Scorpius searches for them. Their safety depends on Crais, who is nearby in Talyn.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E2 - Vitas Mortis
programme.desc: D'Argo takes part in a sacred ritual that helps an old Luxan, an Orican, to survive.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E3 - Taking The Stone
programme.desc: Chiana leaves Moya and goes to 'grave planet' populated by reckless thrill seekers who play dangerous and life-threatening games.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E4 - Crackers Don't Matter
programme.desc: A visitor comes on Moya with a device that could cloak Moya. The crew welcomes him on board, but soon almost everyone is acting paranoid.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E5 - The Way We Weren't
programme.desc: Chiana discovers a recording with Moya's original Pilot. After seeing the recording and realizing Aeryn was involved, Pilot orders Aeryn to leave Moya

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E6 - Picture If You Will
programme.desc: Chiana buys a picture in a store, which is more than it seems. The picture changes and shows Chiana what will happen to her.
